data.text:
Ferguson at the 83rd Academy Awards 2 Nominations / 1 Win Role Director, Producer, Screenwriter USA

Craig Ferguson is the founder and president of Representational Pictures, Inc., and director and producer of No End In Sight (2007) and Inside Job (2010), which won the Academy Award for Best Documentary Feature. Ferguson is also a software entrepreneur, writer and authority in technology policy. For over 20 years, Ferguson had been intensely interested in film, and regularly attended film festivals such as the Telluride Film Festival for over a decade.

Wins[]

83rd Academy Awards, 2010

Best Documentary Feature — Inside Job (shared with Audrey Marrs)
